title: Dubaian
author: Dubaian
created_time: December 22, 2022, 03:29:58 AMLast edit: December 22, 2022, 05:35:03 AM by Dubaian
content: Over the past few years, the crypto world has undergone numerous changes and so has cloud mining. The whole face of cloud mining has changed. Cloud mining will always be the best option to earn profits without the need to pay for equipment and related costs, and 2022 is no exception. Apart from the money making factor, by mining on the cloud platform, the risk is reduced to a great extent. And cloud mining is a profitable mining method.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: Dubaian on December 22, 2022, 03:29:58 AMOver the past few years, the crypto world has undergone numerous changes and so has cloud mining. The whole face of cloud mining has changed. Cloud mining will always be the best option to earn profits without the need to pay for equipment and related costs, and 2022 is no exception. Apart from the money making factor, by mining on the cloud platform, the risk is reduced to a great extent. And cloud mining is a profitable mining method.Cloud mining was in 2022, like in the few past years too, a shiny wrapping over Ponzi scams in order to lure people who don't understand mining into depositing money into their scam.So:1. Cloud mining topics have nothing to do with mining, hence no reason to stay in the mining area.2. So called cloud mining were profitable for the scammers and unprofitable for the rest.All this being said, did you ever use a cloud mining website in 2022 and managed to withdraw? And if you didn't, what are you talking about?!

Many miners start losing at $17,000 bitcoin. How is it possible to make money on bitcoin cloud mining? But there are still price paradoxes on the market, because ASICs are very expensive if we compare payback periods, but the new halving is already at the beginning of 2024.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: No one that I heard makes money in Cloud mining unless you are one of those who made and promote cloud mining sites.Are you?Then for you its profitable since you scam people I am one of people who invest in cloud mining before I invest a few times but in the end, nothing is profitable all of them are scams. Except if the miner exists and the website is trusted where you can rent a real miner sample Nicehash and miningrigrentals that offers ASIC and GPU mining rentals but the profitability depends on the price of the coin and difficulty.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Cloud mining is either a scam, or just totally unprofitable.As far as I know the only people who made money with cloud mining are the ones who just shilled referral links, not necessarily the people who put in their hard-earned money.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: During bear market, almost of top coins aren't profitable to mine anymore even you're using a good mining rigs and you live in a country where electricity price is cheap. Most of miners right now only mine for long term holding, it could be next 2 years or 3 years, since cloud mining is offer you to get payment every week or month, then it's 100% scam.Quote from: mk4 on December 23, 2022, 03:51:37 AMAs far as I know the only people who made money with cloud mining are the ones who just shilled referral links, not necessarily the people who put in their hard-earned money.Because they're able to find a greedy people who want to invest on the scam site and then they got a share about the victim who get scammed.

comments.author: PrimeNumber7
comments.body: OP: with 2022 coming to a close, we need a new thread for the profitability of cloud mining in 2023Cloud mining is generally going to lead to sub par outcomes. Cloud mining adds additional “middle men” to mining, which means that there are additional parties that will perform work, and earn their own profits when compared to mining on your own. At best, this results in diminished returns. The above also raises the risk that one or more entities will scam you and not perform as agreed. Obviously, there is also the risk that whoever is renting the hardware is outright scamming, which will lead to a total loss.

comments.author: TalkativeCoin
comments.body: I had a short test run with BeMine and StromGain, and the short summary is that you're taking away from your potential profit if you would mine yourself. Of course, there's a question of initial hardware investment and the fact that you need to spend time/money for upkeep, but then again, this is something only you can decide on.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Dubaian on December 22, 2022, 03:29:58 AMOver the past few years, the crypto world has undergone numerous changes and so has cloud mining. I used to believe that cloud mining is profitable the concept looks too good to be true until I read a lot of bad reports, and these reports verified that so much cloud mining is actually Ponzi schemes QuoteThe whole face of cloud mining has changed. Cloud mining will always be the best option to earn profits without the need to pay for equipment and related costs, and 2022 is no exception. Apart from the money-making factor, by mining on the cloud platform, the risk is reduced to a great extent. And cloud mining is a profitable mining method.There are so many bad reports on cloud mining and we should not take these reports for granted many of these reports are very alarming you did not show us anything like proof of payment from the cloud mining you've invested you generalized that cloud mining is very profitable disregarding bad reports, we could tag you if you have one cloud mining site promoting in your thread, its good that you don't have one.

There are to many opportunities on crypto industry and avoid thinking about those scams try to research for more information to know what are those good investments and possible scam schemes.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: Dubaian on December 22, 2022, 03:29:58 AMOver the past few years, the crypto world has undergone numerous changes and so has cloud mining. The whole face of cloud mining has changed. Cloud mining will always be the best option to earn profits without the need to pay for equipment and related costs, and 2022 is no exception. Apart from the money making factor, by mining on the cloud platform, the risk is reduced to a great extent. And cloud mining is a profitable mining method.QuoteIs cloud mining profitable in 2022? Yes and no if you join a legit cloud mining pool then yes you can make passive out of it, join a reliable and trusted cloud mining here is an article that will lead you to the best cloud mining and explain how it workshttps://cointelegraph.com/news/how-to-build-a-passive-income-stream-from-cloud-miningThere are also a lot of Ponzi scheme that hides in cloud mining platform, they really don't have the equipment and the manpower, I have seen a project that boasts that they are solar-powered when in fact they are faking pictures they present to their investors in fact, there are stores that sell cloud mining scripts and these are the ones used by Ponzi scheme operators to deceive their investors.People should be aware of how this cloud mining works and should check if they are investing in real cloud mining.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: aioc on December 23, 2022, 01:29:02 PMYes and no if you join a legit cloud mining pool then yes you can make passive out of it, join a reliable and trusted cloud mining here is an article that will lead you to the best cloud mining and explain how it workshttps://cointelegraph.com/news/how-to-build-a-passive-income-stream-from-cloud-miningI see that they mentioned Stormgain in that article. Are you 100% sure that they are an actual cloud mining company? I am asking because some time ago I checked them out a bit, and for me it more seemed like cloud mining part was sort of a gimmick to attract new users and not an actual cloud mining company that mines something (iirc they are trading platforms of some sort).@Dubaian forget about cloud mining. It wasn't smart thing to do 5 years ago, its not now and it will stay the same in 5 years (beside the fact that 99.99% were scam). Just keep it simple and buy bitcoin instead and forget about cloud mining.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Cloud mining was never profitable for anyone else other than person who created this snake oil scheme.I know some of the biggest cloud mining companies stopped existing and they owners got arrested, Hasflare is the last example, and that is all you need to know about this.Cloud mining is more like pyramid scheme and people who send money last will usually lose everything, so stay away from this and don't send them any money.

comments.author: LTU_btc
comments.body: Cloud mining never been profitable. Either it was 2021, 2020, 2019 and so on. What had to happen that it would become profitable in 2022? It always been just another type of ponzi schemes which sooner or later turn into scams.But from other side, your statment is right. Cloud mining is profitable, but just for owner of website. In peak of cloud mining era creators of biggest scams like Hash Ocean become multi-millionaiares.Quote from: Dubaian on December 22, 2022, 03:29:58 AMCloud mining will always be the best option to earn profits without the need to pay for equipment and related costsWhat?! I hope that you're not talking seriously?

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Cloud mining is never become profitable especially to those who invest and bought mining power on such platform. Profits you get just become fee on those high maintenance fees so nothing left. If you're using a calculator it actually takes months or year(s) before you reach your ROI. That's why cloud mining is never profitable since then.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: It is better to call it "Micro earning" because what is happening is completely different from mining and everyone who promotes it is scammer.You can achieve small profits from such investments, but it is similar to the hierarchical market, where investors will be deceived and capital stolen when the site does not begin to provide the necessary liquidity to pay profits.As for the hypothesis that a person buys mining equipment and then tries to use it or rent it to unknown people on the Internet, it is the year 2022, when it is difficult to find a person crazy enough to throw money on the street.

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Not worth it nor profitable.I even think of it just like an upgraded typical scam from those scammers that can no longer victimized people. They're just showing that it's profitable but in reality it's not. And also think that, it's now passed and done and the new thing today is about those interest accounts or staking that's barely profitable.
